          Singapore’s Leading F&B POS System

          Central kitchen system

          Manage orders from multiple outlets, all in one POS terminal, perfect for F&B businesses with multiple outlets

          QR CODE ORDERING

          Our QR code ordering system allows customers to scan the QR code and send their order directly to the kitchen.

          Table Management System

          Easy to create and arrange table layouts according to your stores to make it easier for your employees to take orders

          Food Delivery Integrations

          Get your orders linked and delivered seamlessly with our Food delivery integrations with GrabFood, GrabMart, Lalamove, Foodpanda and Deliveroo with more on the way!

          Appointment Booking Module (New)

          Our system takes customers’ reservations from the booking site, and lets users to manage tables and reservations directly from EPOS platform. This module is closely related to our table management system.

          “EPOS is powerful, yet easy-to-use. Its system has improved our order-taking by reducing the number of steps needed which helps to save on manpower!”

          – Jason
          Orchid Live Seafood

          Save Up To 98% In Costs From Various Government Grants

          PRODUCTIVITY SOLUTIONS GRANT

          Introduced by the IMDA, this grant encourages businesses to invest in digital solutions offering up to 80% in subsidies.

          Skills Future Enterprise Credit

          Eligible employers will receive a one-off S$10,000 credit to cover up to 90% of the remaining costs.

          We Are A Pre-Approved Vendor

          EPOS is a Pre-Approved Vendor for the grants mentioned above. Our solutions are automatically eligible for grants.

          Find Out If You're Eligible

          SOME FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

          GRANTS

          How Do I Qualify For The Above Mentioned Grants (Productivity Solution Grant, SkillsFuture Enterprise Credit and Digital Resilience Bonus)

          For all the grants mentioned, one of the main criteria is that you must be a local business. Following that, all other eligibility criteria are varied. You can read more on the eligibility criteria of the  Productivity Solution Grant, which heavily subsides the majority of the POS System cost, here.

          How Do I Apply For The Grants

          Being a pre-approved vendor for Productivity Solution Grant (PSG), we are able to guide you through the process of filling out the grant application. 

          SkillsFuture Enterprise Credit is based on your Productivity Solution Grant application. Should you meet the eligibility criteria of the SFEC grant, it will automatically be applied to you when you apply for PSG.

          For the Digital Resilience Bonus, if you meet the eligibility criteria, the solution company will handle the submission process.

          How It Is Possible To Receive Up To 98% In Subsidies

          If you meet the eligibility criteria, it is very possible to achieve 98%. Here’s how: the Productivity Solution Grant subsidies up to 80% of the total cost for companies that adopt long term technological solutions (in which EPOS is listed as a pre-approved vendor). Furthermore, Skills Future Enterprises Credit covers 90% of the remaining cost of 18%. This gives you a total of 98% in subsidies.

          What Is A Pre-Approved Solution Vendor

          For all the grants mentioned above, they have a list of pre-approved vendors. There are two criteria that need to be fulfilled before a grant can be approved. The first, is whether the applicant meets all the eligibility criteria applicable which vary from grant to grant.

          Next, is whether the technological solution adopted will help a company improve specifically in different business aspects such as efficiency and profitability. To make the process easier, companies apply for pre-approved status which involves meeting the grants’ stringent requirements to qualify as a technological solution that helps the F&B industry.

          Once vendors become pre-approved for grants, all that’s left is for applicants to meet the eligibility criteria in order for the grant to be approved.

          Packages and Pricing

          What Kind Of Packages Are There

          At the moment we offer 3 different packages, you can find out more information on each package here.

          What Hardware Are Included In The Package

          Across all packages, the standard hardware included are a 13 Inch Touchscreen POS Terminal, Handheld Laser Barcode Scanner, Thermal Receipt Printer, Cash Drawer, Keyboard and Mouse.

          Depending on the package, there may be additional hardware such as Barcode Labelling Device or Handheld Stocktaking Device.

          FEATURES

          Cloud Based POS

          A cloud based POS system allows F&B owners to view and manage their business from any web browser. They can view their sales and inventory data anytime and anywhere, giving them the ability to make better business decisions.

          Inventory Management System

          EPOS provides one of the most advanced inventory systems in the market to help F&B owners manage their inventory, and more specifically their ingredients, with maximum efficiency. Our inventory management system automatically updates stock counts to give F&B owners an accurate summary overview of their business using real time data. Our inventory management system has been designed to manage ingredient inventory that have a limited shelf life as well.

          Using a data driven reordering software that uses your sales and inventory data, you can manage your stock and avoid situations such as overstocking or out of stock problems with your ingredients.

          Ecommerce Integration

          Allows you to integrate your online stores with our POS system. This means that you can manage your customers’ food orders all from one POS terminal, giving you seamless control over all businesses.

          Accounting Integration

          Integrates industry leading accounting software with our POS system. It automatically syncs sales and inventory data to generate your financial reports, helping to cut down on human error and increase efficiency. This makes handling taxes and sales reports less of a headache as well.

          Order Management System

          Our restaurant POS systems allow for three different ways to manage your customers’ orders. We have a QR code ordering system which allows customers to scan the QR code to send their order directly to the kitchen staff. Online ordering is also possible through eCommerce integration that allows orders made online to be sent directly to the POS terminal. We also have tablet ordering which uses our very own WebApp which allows customers to order from web browsers on tablets, compatible with any operating system that has a web browser.
